metadata.name: Horizons
metadata.description:
This is 1 NFT in a collection that have been issued as a single, unique edition + sending the Original Canvas Painting to the NFT owner. 

 Size: 100x200 cm (39.37 x 78.74 inches) 
Volcanic sans, acrylic on canvas.  2019

The HORIZONS  has been created in the studio of Tenerife since 2019. The materials used in the works of this serie: volcanic sand from Tenerife; sands of the Sahara desert; sands from different parts of Spain, such as Tarifa, Cadiz (Gibraltar), Malaga and others; sands from different parts of Europe.

The work of the HORIZONS was presented to:

- Solo exhibition Art Espacio "Desvan Blanco", Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain, 2019; Presentation of the catalog Tierras & Mar, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain, 2019; Solo exhibition National Center for Contemporary Art, Minsk, Belarus, 2020; Solo exhibition AV Art Gallery, Minsk, Belarus, 2020; other exhibition in Russia, Belarus, Spain, Italy, Germany.
